title: Telegram ‘Premium’ subscription adds exclusive reactions and stickers, but the cost is unclear
content:
The popular messaging app Telegram is working on a Premium subscription that adds new exclusive reactions and stickers, but is only available on iOS for the time being.

more…

The post Telegram ‘Premium’ subscription adds exclusive reactions and stickers, but the cost is unclear appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: While there's no cost known just yet, Telegram seems to be working on a paid "Premium" subscription with exclusive stickers and more.
